description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller for handling fund transfer API endpoints, including sending a fund transfer and retrieving a list of transfers.

classes.name: FundTransferController
classes.description: A Spring REST controller managing fund transfer operations via '/api/v1/transfer' endpoint, with methods to send transfers and retrieve transfer history.

methods.name: sendFundTransfer
methods.description: Handles POST requests to initiate a fund transfer, logs request details, and delegates to the service layer.

methods.name: readFundTransfers
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve paginated list of fund transfer records.
